title: Achieving efficient clonal beta cells transfection using nanostraw/nanopore-assisted electroporation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22244-22252
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02791D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Frida Ekstrand, Mokhtar Mapar, Sabrina Ruhrmann, Karl Bacos, Charlotte Ling, Christelle N. Prinz
GFP plasmids are injected in cells using nanostraw and nanopore-electroporation. After optimization, the results show that more plasmids are delivered in cells using nanostraws, but fewer cells express GFP 48 h after injection, compared to nanopores.
